monsters.name: Musketeer
monsters.description: An elite soldier wielding both rapier and early firearm with deadly skill.

attacks.name: Musket
attacks.description: A thunderous crack as black powder propels a lead ball!

attacks.name: Rapier
attacks.description: A lightning-quick thrust with an elegant blade!

specialAbilities.name: Riposte
specialAbilities.description: When enemy misses melee attack, can make rapier attack as reaction.

specialAbilities.name: Reload
specialAbilities.description: Must spend bonus action reloading musket after firing.

specialAbilities.name: Duelist
specialAbilities.description: Has advantage on attack rolls when fighting a single opponent.

flavorText: A musketeer in a plumed hat draws both gun and sword!
En garde! The musketeer challenges with style!
Gunpowder smoke and steel - a true Renaissance warrior!
monsters.defeatedText: The musketeer salutes with their rapier before falling.

monsters.name: Alchemist
monsters.description: A master of early chemistry, creating explosive and toxic compounds.

attacks.name: Alchemical Fire
attacks.description: A flask of volatile chemicals explodes! (10-foot radius)

specialAbilities.name: Experimental Elixir
specialAbilities.description: Can drink elixir as bonus action: heal 3d8+4 HP, gain +2 AC for 3 turns, or become invisible for 1 turn.

specialAbilities.name: Alchemical Savant
specialAbilities.description: All acid and fire damage increased by 1d6.

specialAbilities.name: Smoke Screen
specialAbilities.description: Can create 20-foot radius heavily obscured area as action.

flavorText: Glass vials clink as an alchemist prepares their concoctions!
The smell of sulfur fills the air - an alchemist is near!
Science and magic blur as the alchemist attacks!
monsters.defeatedText: The alchemist's vials shatter as they fall, releasing colorful fumes.

monsters.name: Clockwork Guardian
monsters.description: An intricate mechanical construct powered by springs and gears.

attacks.name: Clockwork Fist
attacks.description: Gears whir as a bronze fist strikes with mechanical precision!

attacks.name: Blade Saw
attacks.description: A spinning saw blade extends from its arm!

specialAbilities.name: Immutable Form
specialAbilities.description: Immune to any effect that would alter its form.

specialAbilities.name: Self-Repair
specialAbilities.description: At start of turn, regains 10 HP if has at least 1 HP.

specialAbilities.name: Multiattack
specialAbilities.description: Makes two attacks per turn.

flavorText: Ticking fills the air as a clockwork guardian activates!
Bronze and brass gleam as the mechanical construct attacks!
Precision engineering given deadly purpose!
monsters.defeatedText: The clockwork guardian's gears grind to a halt as it collapses.

monsters.name: Plague Doctor
monsters.description: A mysterious physician whose very presence brings disease and death.

attacks.name: Infected Cane
attacks.description: A disease-laden cane strikes! (DC 15 CON save or poisoned for 3 turns)

attacks.name: Miasma Cloud
attacks.description: Releases toxic vapors! (15-foot cone, DC 16 CON save for half)

specialAbilities.name: Plague Aura
specialAbilities.description: Creatures starting turn within 10 feet take 2d6 poison damage.

specialAbilities.name: Immunity
specialAbilities.description: Immune to poison damage and disease.

specialAbilities.name: Physician's Touch
specialAbilities.description: Can cast Cure Wounds or Inflict Wounds (3d10 necrotic damage, DC 15 CON save for half).

flavorText: A figure in a beaked mask emerges from poisonous mist!
The plague doctor's eyes gleam darkly behind glass lenses!
Disease incarnate walks among the living!
monsters.defeatedText: The plague doctor's mask cracks as they fall, releasing final toxic fumes.

monsters.name: Gargoyle Sentinel
monsters.description: A stone creature that comes to life to defend ancient buildings.

specialAbilities.name: False Appearance
specialAbilities.description: While motionless, indistinguishable from stone statue.

specialAbilities.name: Flyby
specialAbilities.description: Can fly 60 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

specialAbilities.name: Damage Resistance
specialAbilities.description: Resistance to non-magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

specialAbilities.name: Multiattack
specialAbilities.description: Makes one bite and two claw attacks.

flavorText: Stone grinds against stone as the gargoyle comes to life!
What you thought was a statue spreads its wings!
The guardian awakens - a gargoyle attacks!
monsters.defeatedText: The gargoyle returns to lifeless stone, crumbling.

monsters.name: Noble Duelist
monsters.description: A master swordsman from a wealthy family, undefeated in countless duels.

attacks.name: Masterwork Rapier
attacks.description: A perfect strike to a vital point!

specialAbilities.name: Riposte Master
specialAbilities.description: When enemy misses melee attack, automatically makes rapier attack that deals double damage.

specialAbilities.name: Multiattack
specialAbilities.description: Makes three rapier attacks per turn.

specialAbilities.name: Uncanny Dodge
specialAbilities.description: When hit, can use reaction to halve damage.

specialAbilities.name: Disarming Strike
specialAbilities.description: On critical hit, target drops weapon.

flavorText: A noble draws their blade with a flourish and a smile!
The greatest swordsman of the age stands before you!
En garde! The dueling master assumes a perfect stance!
monsters.defeatedText: The duelist acknowledges your skill with a bow before falling.

monsters.name: Artillery Crew
monsters.description: Soldiers operating an early cannon, raining explosive destruction.

attacks.name: Cannon Fire
attacks.description: An explosive cannonball detonates! (15-foot radius, DC 17 DEX save for half)

specialAbilities.name: Reload
specialAbilities.description: Must spend full turn reloading cannon after firing.

specialAbilities.name: Crew
specialAbilities.description: Represents 3-4 soldiers. When reduced below 60 HP, loses multiattack.

flavorText: The cannon's fuse is lit - incoming!
Artillery crew loads and aims their devastating weapon!
Thunder and smoke - the age of gunpowder has arrived!
monsters.defeatedText: The artillery crew falls, their cannon left smoking and unmanned.
